nodes.text: Patricia Katarn was the wife of Morgan Katarn and the mother of Kyle Katarn.

Morgan fell in love with her, and they were married towards the end of the reign of the Galactic Republic.
She was killed when the family's BT-16 perimeter security droid's sensors malfunctioned. Mistaking Patricia for a hostile target, it opened fire, killing her instantly.
It was Jan Ors's opinion that Kyle had his mother's eyes.
